thread.title: Gossip | Robbie Keane announces the birth of his second child with wife Claudine
thread.title_full: Gossip | Robbie Keane announces the birth of his second child with wife Claudine - entertainment.ie

author: Sheena McGinley
title: Gossip | Robbie Keane announces the birth of his second child with wife Claudine
text:
A huge congratulations to Robbie and Claudine Keane who have welcomed the arrival of their second babbie! And let's not forget Robbie Jnr, who's just become a big brother - with that role comes much responsibility (like deploying dead arms when required).
In a statement released to Keane's Facebook page : 'Robbie and Claudine Keane are delighted to announce the birth of their gorgeous baby boy, who was born at 7pm on the 5th of October weighing 8lbs at the Cedars Sinai hospital LA. Mum and baby are doing great. Robert is already enjoying his new role as big brother."
Robert was only thrilled to learn he was going to have sibling in his life with Claudine and Robbie announced the news to him last July.
 Very excited to announce that Claudine is pregnant with our second child. We are all delighted. Couldn't resist sharing Robert's reaction when he found out his wish had finally come true.
Posted by Robbie Keane on Saturday, July 25, 2015 MORE: Watch: Justin Bieber posts Robbie Keane's video of post match bliss after Ireland beat Germany
